quotes: I was very glad to speak as EU Joint Research Centre expert last week at the closing conference of the EU TSI project Building Capacity on Evidence-informed Policy Making in Greece.

organizations.name: Council of Economic Advisers (SOE)
quotes: Their blueprint incorporated a new evidence-informed policy making unit backed by a scientific advisory committee that could facilitate networking. They also proposed expanding the range of existing scientific policy brokers, such as the Council of Economic Advisers (SOE) and the Expert unit on Employment, Insurance, Welfare and Social issues (MEKY).

organizations.name: OECD
quotes: Vaia Karapanou of OECD gave an international perspective on using science in policy making.
